org.pepstock.charba.client.callbacks

Interface Scriptable<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of result of invocation method.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AlignCallback, AnchorCallback, BackgroundColorCallback, BorderAlignCallback, BorderColorCallback, BorderSkippedCallback, BorderWidthCallback, ClampCallback, ClipCallback, ColorCallback, DisplayCallback, FontCallback, OffsetCallback, OpacityCallback, PaddingCallback, PointStyleCallback, RadiusCallback, RotationCallback, TextAlignCallback, TextShadowBlurCallback, TextShadowColorCallback, TextStrokeColorCallback, TextStrokeWidthCallback

    public interface Scriptable<T>
    Interface to map all callback of scriptable options available for CHART.JS.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T invoke(IsChart chart, ScriptableContext context)
      Returns the value of property at runtime, using the chart instance and the context.

    • Method Detail

      • invoke

        T invoke(IsChart chart,
         ScriptableContext context)
        Returns the value of property at runtime, using the chart instance and the context.
        Parameters:
        chart - chart instance
        context - context instance
        Returns:
        value of property to be applied
